text: tatha aaye yoosuf tumhaare paas isase poorv khule pramaanon ke saath, to tum baraabar sandeh mein rahe usase, jo tumhaare paas laaye. yahaantak ki jab ve mar gaye, to tumane kaha ki kadaapi nahin bhejega allaah unake pashchaat koee rasool.[1] isee prakaar allaah kupath kar deta hai use, jo ullanghanakaaree daanvaadol ho
